DOC.brief_title: Study IPH2201 ( Monalizumab ) Cetuximab Patients With Recurrent Metastatic Squamous Cell Carcinoma Head Neck

In phase II , measurable disease per Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors [ RECIST ] 1.1 mandate . In phase Ib , patient without measurable disease eligible . 4 . Adequate hematologic , immunologic , liver renal function , define hemoglobin ≥ 9.0 g/dL , absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1,500/mm3 , platelet ≥ 100,000/mm3 , total bilirubin ≤ 1.5 X institutional upper normal limit ( UNL ) , aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) ≤ 2.5 X institutional UNL , serum creatinine ≤1.5 X institutional UNL estimate ( CockcroftGault formula ) measure creatinine clearance ≥ 50 mL/min 12 .
